lead_paragraph: “An Evening With Lypsinka’s Maid,” Mr. Epperson’s new show at Feinstein’s/54 Below, features him without his female alter ego.

headline.main: Review: John Epperson Steps Out, Leaving the Diva at Home

snippet: “An Evening With Lypsinka’s Maid,” Mr. Epperson’s new show at Feinstein’s/54 Below, features him without his female alter ego.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews concert by drag actor, singer and pianist John Epperson at Feinstein’s/54 Below.
